HomePage.SubHeadline: Decoding data, unlocking hidden investment potential

Chat.Headline: Turn every question into an investment opportunity
Chat.SubHeadline: Access sharp, data-backed insights distilled into clear takeaways
Questions: Analyze the cash flow and debt structure of Hoa Phat Group (HPG) over the past 5 years
Compare the P/E and P/B ratios of the banking sector this quarter
Provide an analysis of the PV DRILLING III rig project of PVD
Analyze the impact of tariffs on Vietnamese export enterprises

WhoItsFor.Headline: Solutions for Every Level of Investment
WhoItsFor.Card1: Quickly identify opportunities and detect risks through comprehensive analysis of markets, news, and crowd sentiment — all backed by verified data.
WhoItsFor.Card2: Automate research workflows, enhance team efficiency, and make faster, more accurate decisions with proprietary AI models.
WhoItsFor.Card3: Build custom financial applications with seamless integration of clean, reliable data directly into your systems.

CorporateFinance.Title: Corporate Finance
CorporateFinance.SubTitle: Uncover the financial health of businesses
CorporateFinance.Desc: Our platform automatically extracts financial reports, helping you identify growth signals, spot early cashflow or debt risks, and reveal the bigger picture hidden within the numbers.

MarketSentiment.Title: Market Sentiment
MarketSentiment.SubTitle: Listen to the pulse of the market
MarketSentiment.Desc: We aggregate and analyze data from trusted sources including news, forums, and expert communities. Miquant's algorithms quantify market consensus, helping you detect crowd-driven risks early, track money flow, and make better-informed decisions.

EconomicEvents.Title: Economic Events
EconomicEvents.SubTitle: Stay ahead of macro shifts
EconomicEvents.Desc: Our platform connects your portfolio with key policy decisions and macro indicators (CPI, GDP, interest rates). Stay proactive by adjusting strategies to capture opportunities or hedge risks before the waves hit.

TrendingTopics.Title: Trending Topics
TrendingTopics.Desc: Our technology scans and clusters thousands of news articles daily. Instead of reading dozens of reports, you can capture the most critical investment themes in just 5 minutes - distilled into sharp, concise insights.

AutomatedStockValuation.Title: Automated Stock Valuation
AutomatedStockValuation.Desc: Get a stock valuation in 90 seconds with a single command. The system applies standard valuation methods (P/E, P/B, EV/EBITDA) while providing a comprehensive view of potential, outlook, and risks across 400+ listed companies in Vietnam’s stock market.

AIChatbot.Title: AI Chatbot
AIChatbot.Desc: Built with one purpose: to answer any investor’s question - from macroeconomic analysis and industry trends to specific companies or projects.

AIRanking.Title: AI Ranking
AIRanking.Desc: Go from idea to a back-tested strategy in seconds. Instead of manual filtering, let AI do the heavy lifting: searching, ranking, and recommending portfolios that match your exact criteria.

AboutPage.Headline: Telling Investment Stories Through Numbers
AboutPage.Body: Miquant is an AI-powered investment platform built to turn financial market complexity into clear, actionable decisions. We provide validated quantitative data and tools that help you invest faster, smarter, and with greater confidence.
Highlights: stocks continuously valued and updated by AI
stocks analyzed and screened for intrinsic opportunities

Vision.Headline1: From Quantitative Analytics to AI-Powered Investing
Vision.Body1: At Miquant, we believe superior investment advantages are built on sharp, timely data analysis. Rooted in strong quantitative foundations, we integrate the power of Artificial Intelligence to help investors truly own their decisions - from spotting opportunities to managing risks. Miquant delivers a reliable data infrastructure and AI tools for modern investors in Vietnam and Southeast Asia. Guided by a multi-disciplinary team, we are committed to transforming financial complexity into your tangible competitive edge.
Vision.Headline2: Partnering with Investors to Decode Corporate Fundamentals
Vision.Body2: Amid noisy, fragmented data, our mission is not to flood you with more information - but to extract signals. By combining quantitative finance with AI, we deliver clear investment theses with the belief that once signals are clarified, every investor can make better, more confident decisions.
Vision.Headline3: A Platform Built on People and Data
Vision.Body3: We are a young team driven by a shared passion for math, data, and finance. This passion fuels our commitment to applying technology - turning complex analyses into intuitive, accessible investment tools. Every feature is designed with precision to deliver practical value tailored to the needs of Vietnamese investors.

Values.Title: Transparent, Data-Driven Analysis
Values.Desc: Every investment thesis must be built on verifiable, auditable data. We believe in eliminating guesswork, replacing bias with transparent, logical, and evidence-based analysis.

Values.Title: Built by Finance Experts, for Real Investors
Values.Desc: Miquant’s mission is to bridge the gap between professional-grade analytics and individual investors. We combine financial expertise and technology to make complex methodologies accessible through a simple, intuitive platform.

Values.Title: Your Data, Your Ownership
Values.Desc: We don’t sell your data. We empower you to own it. Our platform lets you explore, extract, and build your unique investment perspective - ensuring your decisions are independent, well-founded, and strategic.

Values.Title: Security, Transparency, No Black Box
Values.Desc: Miquant is built with the highest security standards and your data is fully respected. More importantly, every AI model and algorithm we use is explainable and verifiable, so you always understand the “why” behind every result.

AboutPage.Mission: Our mission is to empower the next generation of investors with the confidence to make smarter decisions. We achieve this by building intuitive tools that combine the power of AI and quantitative finance - helping investors move from automated data analysis to transparent, personalized strategies.
